01-basic-button.title: Basic Button
01-basic-button.description: A simple primary button with default styling. Use this as the standard action button in your interface.

02-secondary-button.title: Secondary Button
02-secondary-button.description: Secondary action button. Use for supplementary actions.

03-outline-button.title: Outline Button
03-outline-button.description: Outlined button with border. Use for tertiary actions.

04-ghost-button.title: Ghost Button
04-ghost-button.description: Minimal ghost button. Use for low-priority actions.
